title: The Essential Guide to Portraits - 4th Edition

Taking stunning portrait photographs has never been easier thanks to the invaluable advice and inspiration revealed within this expert written MagBook. Combining the best tips and advice from professional photographers, Digital SLR Photography magazine have created a comprehensive guide to taking a variety of portrait types spanning fashion shoots, family portraits and creative contemporary compositions. Featuring easy-to-follow tutorials, gear guides and kit reviews, as well as stunning professional images to inspire our own shoots, this guide is a must-have for all aspiring portrait photographers.

With the help of this MagBook you'll not only master basic and more advanced techniques, you'll also develop your Photoshop skills, get to grips with lighting set ups, and of course shot stunning and professional looking images!

The Essential Guide to Portraits - 4th Edition
